message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. It has been designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. We believe its value to you is worth more than $1,000,000. Considering its worth to both parties, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I agree your product has value, that price point is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to consider a purchase closer to $850,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I understand your position and would like to propose an alternative. How about we aim for a middle ground, suggesting a price of $1,000,000 for the product? This respects the value you see in it while allowing us to move forward with the transaction.
